mapper.select: SELECT ci.*, ifnull(follow.follow_id,0) followId FROM BTL.COMPANYINFO ci left join (select * from follow where follow.user_id = (select user.user_id from user where user.user_email= #{userEmail})) follow on follow.ci_id = ci.ci_id where ci.ci_companyName = #{companyName} limit 1
select cp_totalcnt from companypersonal where ci_companyName = #{ci_companyName} order by cp_month DESC limit 1
SELECT max(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ci_since, CURRENT_DATE())) FROM companyinfo where ci_companyName = #{ci_companyName} limit 1
select count(*) from companyinfo where ci_industry like concat('%','응용','%')
select count(ci_companyName) from companypersonal where cp_month = (select cp_month from companypersonal where ci_companyName order by cp_month DESC limit 1)
select count(ci_companyName) from companyinfo where ci_industry like concat('%','응용','%') and ci_since <= (select ci_since from companyinfo where ci_companyName = #{ci_companyName})

select count(A.cp_totalcnt) from companypersonal as A where A.cp_totalcnt >= (select cp_totalcnt from companypersonal where ci_companyName =#{ci_companyName} order by cp_month DESC limit 1) and A.cp_month = (select cp_month from companypersonal where ci_companyName order by cp_month DESC limit 1) ;

select count(A.cp_incnt) from companypersonal as A where A.cp_incnt >= (select cp_incnt from companypersonal where ci_companyName =#{ci_companyName} order by cp_month DESC limit 1) and A.cp_month = (select cp_month from companypersonal where ci_companyName order by cp_month DESC limit 1) ;

select count(A.cp_outcnt) from companypersonal as A where A.cp_outcnt >= (select cp_outcnt from companypersonal where ci_companyName =#{ci_companyName} order by cp_month DESC limit 1) and A.cp_month = (select cp_month from companypersonal where ci_companyName order by cp_month DESC limit 1) ;
